reasoning.completeness: The Generated Answer covers approximately 60-70% of key points. summary: The Generated Answer correctly identifies key elements of the COVID-19 diagnostic reasoning but has a notable omission of loss of smell as a distinct presenting symptom, which was prominently featured throughout the consultation.
